intro: Tupa deckenii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its rosette-shaped leaves and showy, long-lasting flowers. Its flowers come in a variety of colors, including purple, pink, white, and red, making it a popular ornamental plant. Tupa deckenii is also known for its ability to produce offsets, which can be used for propagation.
